mapper.select: SELECT PSN, LCN, FCN, LPID, LTIM, PID, TIM, TF, BAL, FEE,TT, RN, EPID, ETIM,TAC FROM ( SELECT PSN, LCN, FCN, LPID, LTIM, PID, TIM, TF, BAL, FEE,TT, RN, EPID, ETIM,TAC,rownum r FROM T_MCARD_CONSUME t1 WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM T_MCARD_CONSUME_ERROR where PID=t1.PID AND PSN=t1.PSN ) AND SETTLE_DATE=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ZIP_FILE_NAME=#{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND rownum <= #{endNum} ) WHERE r > #{startNum}
SELECT count(1) FROM T_MCARD_CONSUME_ERROR WHERE SETTLE_DATE=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZIP_FILE_NAME=#{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
